script.name: BSHExpose

property.name: expo
property.value: 0:a value to have available to the source first

property.name: expo1
property.value: 1:a value to have available to the source

property.name: expo2
property.value: 2:a value to have available to the source

property.name: expo
property.value: final:a value to have available to the source second

script.source: print("expo is equal to"+expo); print("expo2 is equal to"+expo2);
